Dear David Vydra,
  I created my JMUnit project in sourceforge. I'd like to=
 announce it in both sites that you mentioned in your last e-mail, but I do=
n't know how to do it, may you help me? I noticed that you are a member of =
the www.testdriven.com. I pretend to send e-mail to some lists, like the ju=
nit@yahoogroups.com, for further announcement.
  Sincerely yours,
  Brunno =
Silva
  

David Vydra <dv.lists@...> escreveu:
  Brunno,

In Open Sou=
rce you can do it without needing to ask permission. When you are
ready jus=
t announce on this list, http://testdriven.com , and
http://xprogramming.co=
m . That should give you enough publicity to get
people to take a look at i=
t.

Regards,
David
www.testdriven.com

n API. Soon, I

the JMUnit (Java Micro Unit).

n has done

rojects. So, I had the idea to put this version
